Privacy

If you will see logo of 1GARD member on the sites that means those sites owned by 1GARD System Member, the numbers indicates 1GARD discount rate. (Sample below)

your 1GARD account

The absence of a nummerical record near the card symbol means the Member currantly do not provide discounts or access to free services. The bearer of this account must to use account number to verify the right on 1GARD discount or access. There is no plastic card.

The bearer of "Virtual Access Card Account" has the right to put in an application to 1GARD Access Card. This account is free of charch. on-line verification possible only. Web usage only (Web stores, on-line & offline information services and so on).

Why this System is available.

1GARD International Access Program (1GARD System) is based on exchange between holder of 1GARD Access Card or Card (Cardholder) and Company-Member of 1GARD International Access Program (1GARD Member). 1GARD Processing Center makes this exchange possible. Cardholder places at 1GARD Processing Center's disposal anonymous information such as age, country residence, place of birth, professional occupation, and other required info of one's own free will and receives Money Saving opportunity instead (1GARD Access Card account). The 1GARD Member realize Money Saving opportunity to Cardholder by providing discount on products or services (1GARD discount) and receive unique marketing statistics and reports from 1GARD Processing Center.

Processing center supports on-line and offline verifications of 1GARD Access Card account.
on-line verification confirms existence of the account by special accout number via Internet and creates statistic records in Data Base. These way is perfect for web based shops, stores, paid services.
Offline verification.
1GARD Member's representative makes sure that plastic 1GARD Access Card exists physically. Than representative have to copy embossed card number. After these procedures representative can make 1GARD discount.
